title: WeCrashed premieres on Apple TV+ starring Jared Leto and Anne Hathaway
content:
Today, the limited series WeCrashed premieres on Apple TV+. WeCrashed stars Jared Leto and Anne Hathaway as Adam Neumann, the CEO of office space startup WeWork, and his wife Rebekah Neumann. WeCrashed charts the crazy ventures that led to its meteoric fall from grace.

more…

description: Today, the limited series WeCrashed premieres on Apple TV+. WeCrashed stars Jared Leto and Anne Hathaway as Adam Neumann, the CEO of office space startup WeWork, and his wife Rebekah Neumann. WeCrashed charts the crazy ventures that led to its meteoric fall from grace. WeWork still exists today, but at a much lower valuation. At […]
